participant_1.background:
I just want to have fun with my friends.
I am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home.
They are constantly on my back.
I work took i have a part time job at burger king.
I do not drink or do drugs or anything.

participant_2.background:
I am a swim coach at my local pool.
I am studying to be a computer programmer.
My mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.
My family and i are from india.
My favorite music genre is death metal.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to swim, play video games, and listen to music.
That's cool. I like to swim too. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but I'm especially into first-person shooters and RPGs.
I've never been much of a gamer myself. I'm more of a bookworm.
That's cool. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially into fantasy and science fiction.
Those are my favorite genres too! What's your favorite book?
I'm not sure I can pick just one favorite book. But I really love the Harry Potter series.
I love Harry Potter too! It's my favorite series.
What's your favorite book in the series?
I think my favorite book is the Prisoner of Azkaban.
That's my favorite book too!
It's so good! I love the character development in that book.
Me too! It's so well-written.
I agree. It's one of the best books I've ever read.
Me too. It's so hard to pick just one favorite book.
I know, right? There are so many great books out there.
Yeah, it's hard to choose.
But that's part of the fun, right?
Yeah, it is. It's fun to explore different genres and find new books to love.
I agree. It's so exciting to find a new book that you love.
Yeah, it is. It's like finding a new friend.
